2025-08-06T04:50:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to landslide, the bus service arrangement is as follows: The bus service of KMB route no. 94 will be truncated: Sai Kung <-> Pak Tam Chung For the latest service arrangement of individual bus route, members of the public can refer to the information on the bus company's website or mobile application.
2025-08-06T04:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 因受山泥傾瀉影響，以下巴⼠服務安排如下： 九巴第94號線縮短行程:西貢<->北潭涌 有關個別巴士路線的最新服務情況，市⺠可參閱巴⼠公司的網⾴或流動應⽤程式內的資訊。
